description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Hexblade Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Hexblade Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlur000000]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBrandingSm]{Branding Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResistance]{Resistance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWrathfulSm]{Wrathful Smite}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlink00000]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplElementalW]{Elemental Weapon}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPhantasKil]{Phantasmal Killer}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStaggering]{Staggering Smite}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBanishingS]{Banishing Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDestructiv]{Destructive Wave}
